name: Royal Smash
description: Smash-style burger with crispy edges, double beef patties, melted cheddar, and house-made tangy sauce.

name: Bacon BBQ Delight
description: Juicy beef patty, smoky BBQ sauce, crispy bacon, and crunchy onion rings.

name: Crispy Chicken Classic
description: Crispy chicken fillet, lettuce, tomato, and a creamy garlic mayo.

name: Blue BBQ Chicken
description: Grilled chicken fillet topped with tangy blue cheese, BBQ sauce, and fresh arugula.

name: Veggie Garden Delight
description: A hearty vegetarian burger with a grilled veggie patty, fresh greens, and basil aioli.

name: Grilled Halloumi Burger
description: Grilled halloumi cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, avocado, and a balsamic glaze.

name: Rustic Rye Burger
description: A hearty rye burger with a beef patty, caramelized onions, pickled cucumber, and mustard mayo.

name: Crispy Fish Delight
description: Golden-battered fish fillet with lettuce, tartar sauce, and fresh dill on a brioche bun.

name: Double Bacon Smash
description: Two crispy-edged smash patties, double cheddar, crispy bacon, and smoky BBQ mayo.

name: Chicken Avocado Bliss
description: Grilled chicken breast, creamy avocado slices, lettuce, tomato, and garlic aioli.

name: Japanese Panko Chicken
description: Crispy panko-breaded chicken, Chinese cabbage, sweet chili sauce, and sesame mayo.

name: Smokey BBQ Burger
description: Beef patty with marinated red onions, smoky BBQ sauce, and melted gouda cheese.

name: Sunday Roast Burger
description: Slow-roasted beef brisket, horseradish mayo, caramelized onions, and arugula on a toasted brioche bun.
